I'm so sick of reading stupid shit from people talking about viruses. Anybody who flat out says something from VIP or Trusted sources is a virus needs to have their internet removed. I've been pirating games for as long as game pirating has been around, and most of my software is pirated as well (excluding free-ware). I use Avast, always have, and for now always intend to. Know how many viruses I've gotten from games? 0. None, not a god damn one. Even if something flags (usually only ever happens with keygens) I can just open it in sandbox mode, get the keys I need, and close it. Nothing happens. If you people can't learn how things work with pirated software then go buy it and quit crying and bitching and bothering those of us who aren't complete and total morons.
Just temporarily disable your anti-virus if you get any warnings, and install the game. It works just fine.
